channel.title: Cant add Doors as a Global Object?
channel.description:
Title says all, When i do this it shows uo with an invisible object, like you cant go through or click on it jsut it blocks you???
How do you add Doors?

item.title: Cant add Doors as a Global Object?
item.dc:creator: @F-0-N-Z-Y F-0-N-Z-Y
item.description:
@F-0-N-Z-Y wrote:

if there is an existing door, find

case ???:

replace the ??? with the door’s object ID.

if its not added,
add it!

simple

if you dont know the code, just search:

"case "
untill you find a door case, copy it, and change the variables.

the rest is pretty easy, just play around untill you get it right.
